briefTitle: Neoadjuvant Treatment of gBRCA-Mutated HER2-Negative Breast Cancer With HRS-1167 and Famitinib ± Camrelizumab
officialTitle: Neoadjuvant Treatment of gBRCA-Mutated HER2-Negative Breast Cancer With HRS-1167 and Famitinib/ HRS-1167, Famitinib and Camrelizumab: A Prospective, Open-label, Multicenter, Phase II Trial
conditions: BRCA-Mutated Breast Carcinoma, HER2-negative Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Safety run-in: Incidence rate of dose-limiting toxicities (DLTs)
